verbs.description: [ARG0: A law enforcement official] [V: leaked] [ARG1: a suspicious activity report about Trump lawyer Michael Cohen and payments by Novartis and AT&T to his Essential Consultants company] , The New Yorker reports .

[ARG1: A law enforcement official leaked a suspicious activity report about Trump lawyer Michael Cohen and payments by Novartis and AT&T to his Essential Consultants company] , [ARG0: The New Yorker] [V: reports] .
